DMD2 Testperiod Du har en 30 dagars gratis testperiod. Om du har en speciell DMD2 Edition licensnyckel, vänligen mata in den för att aktivera. Fortsätt Testperiod Mata In Nyckel Avsluta Testperiod Mata In DMD2-Edition Nyckel:

Styrkontroll fokus När en notifiering är synlig kommer kontrollen att fokusera på den. Enterknappen öppnar notifieringen och bakåtknappen rensar notifieringen. Appfilter Välj för vilka appar du vill se en pop-up Visa endast den senaste notifieringen för varje grupp Om aktiverad ser du bara den senaste notifieringen för varje notifieringsgrupp. T.ex. det senaste meddelandet från en chat-notifiering. Visa Notifieringar För: Alla / Ingen Stäng
Tripp Val Automatisk Tripp-återställning Tripp återställs automatiskt om inte DMD2 startats under inställd tid Tid För Automatisk Trippåterställning
6 timmar
12 timmar
1 dag
2 dagar
5 dagar
OEM-Registrering Registreringsprocess (kräver internetanslutning) Använd endast om din motorcykel kom med en Android-enhet förinstallerad med Drive Mode Dashboard 2.
Information och Länkar DMD2 Version Installerad version: Läs mer om DMD2 appen på den officiella hemsidan DMD2 skapades för dig av Denna version av DMD2 är optimerad för Tripltek-enheter Besök och följ vår Facebook-sida för de senaste nyheterna Gå med i vår Facebook-grupp Häng med i diskussionen om nya funktioner, buggar och förfrågningar Speciella Licensnycklar Provperiod / DMD2 Edition Hantera Provperiod eller mata in nyckel för DMD2 Edition
Välkommen till DMD2 Provperiod DMD2 är framtagen för att förvandla din enhet till en komplett instrumentbräda för motorcyklar och bilar med speciellt fokus på adventure och off-road. Den inkluderar en Karta för navigering, en Roadbook, OBD2-sensorer och mycket mer. Starta
GPS-inställningar Filter För Sämre GPS-noggrannhet För enheter med lite sämre GPS-kvalitet
Val För Ej Play Store Enhet Avaktivera Kontroll Av CARPE Controller App Slutar övervaka kontrollerappen och kommer inte att fråga om att installera eller uppdatera längre. CARPE Controller Hittad Det verkar som att du använder en CARPE Controller. För att få full fördel av den bör du installera kontrollappen. Vill du installera den nu?
Lagring Sätt lagringen till ett borttagbart SD-kort För offline-kartor och användarfiler. SD-kort saknas! Tidigare använt SD-kort saknas, vänligen sätt i det! Prova igen Använd Internt Minne Väntar på att SD-kort ska hittas Vänligen vänta på att SD-kort ska hittas för att färdigställa… Avbryt & Byt till Internt Minne Annat SD-kort! Det ser ut som att du har ersatt ditt Sd-kort, vill du använda detta kort? Om inte, vänligen sätt i rätt SD-kort! Kontrollera igen SD-kort saknas fortfarande! Vänligen kontrollera igen! Flytta Kartfiler? Vill du flytta kartfiler från det interna minnet till SD-kort? Detta kan misslyckas om det inte finns tillräckligt med plats! Vill du flytta kartfiler från SD-kortet till det interna minnet? Detta kan misslyckas om det inte finns tillräckligt med plats! Flyttar filer, vänligen vänta! Stäng inte appen eller gå till annan sida!
TRIPP Trippstatistik Se information i realtid om din tur, information som distans, total tid, körtid, stopptid och snitthastighet. APPAR Appgenvägar Få snabb tillgång till appar för att öppna din favorit. Välj Appgenväg eller Radera Plats Radera Plats OBD RPM OBD RPM Indikator En OBD-baserad varvtalsindikator med ren design, inkluderar färgändring för varvtalsstopp och numerisk visning. KURS GPS-kurs En grafisk indikator för din nuvarande kurs baserat på GPS-data, inkluderar gradvisning. MEDIA Mediaspelarkontroll Låter dig kontrollera din aktiva media, med omslagsbild, spår och artistnamn (kräver tillgång till notifieringar). NAV Kartvy Your map view with all the loaded content and active states, does not include map controls and can only be loaded on the left panel. SPEED GPS Speed A big numeric speed value showing your current travel speed based on GPS data. INFO GPS & OBD Indicators User selectable values from OBD sensors and GPS data. NOTIFICATIONS Notifications List A list of your currently active notifications. No notifications yet EXTERNAL WIDGET System Widget Load Android system widgets from your installed apps. CLOCK A Big Clock Just a simple big digital clock, in case time is crucial for you. PROGRESS Map Progress Activity Shows navigation instructions or GPX track progress depending on the active state between the two. Select Widget
Left Panel Right Panel Center Top Center Bottom Change Widget
Distance Total Time Travel Time Stop Time Avg Speed
Select GPS/OBD Sensor GPS Altitude Altitude GPS Heading Time Heading GPS Speed Speed Trip Max Speed Max Speed Trip Distance Trip Total Time Trip Travel Time Trip Stop Time Trip Avg Speed OBD Speed RPM Coolant Voltage Fuel Throttle Spark MAP IAT MAF Invisible Reset AdvCtrl Voltage
Media Control Permission Media Control Widget requires access to notifications to read media player content like title, artist, album name and artwork. Do you want to allow this permission?
Trip Reset Are you sure you want to reset the trip statistics?
Notifications Pop-Up Do you want DMD2 to access notifications to show you a pop-up for any new notification? You can configure which apps you want to see pop-up for in the Settings > Notifications.
New Notifications Left/Right - Dismiss
Favorite Apps Apps Filter Enable apps filter Hides the apps set in the app filter list Sorting Select how to sort the app shortcuts
App Name - Alphabetical
App Developer Name - Alphabetical
By Install Date
By Last Updated
Sorting Direction
Ascending
Descending
Set hidden apps Click here to set which apps to hide or show Select Apps to Hide Available actions for this app: Uninstall Hide Cancel
OBD Preferences OBD Bluetooth Device Setup Select which OBD Protocol to use OBD Protocol Reader Config Commands Commands to configure bluetooth reader, separate with a new line Choose Paired OBD Device Select from paired bluetooth devices. Make sure dongle is paired first! Select ELM327 Bluetooth Device Get Voltage from Dongle Use ST command for voltage reading instead of ECU PID Fuel Level Settings Calculate fuel level If your level is not reported by the ECU you can let DMD2 calculate it based on average mileage per tank. To reset press the fuel icon when you fill up. Fuel Tank Average Mileage What is your average mileage with a full tank Speed and RPM Options GPS Speed Value Source Use GPS/Terrain Wheel Sensor instead of OBD Speed value (which might not be available) Set Maximum RPM Set your vehicle maximum RPM value Set redline RPM Set your redline RPM value Throttle Options Use RAW Throttle Position value Use actual OBD2 raw value or calibrate minimum and maximum positions Calibrate Throttle Position This will start a dialog with instructions for throttle minimum/maximum position calibration. Requires the ECU to be ON and OBD dongle connected, the engine should be off. This will NOT change any value in your ECU!
COOLANT Coolant Temperature VOLTAGE Voltage THROTTLE Throttle Position FUEL Fuel Level SPARK Spark Advance IAT Intake Temperature MAF Mass Air Flow MAP Mass Air Pressure
Select OBD Sensor Set a new OBD Sensor for this slot
Minimum Throttle Position Calibration PLEASE TURN ON THE ENGINE! Make sure vehicle is at stable post warm-up idle!!! Your throttle should be at the minimum position (at idle / totally off). Press the Set button when ready. Set Minimum Maximum Throttle Position Calibration PLEASE TURN OFF THE ENGINE! Make sure ignition is ON and then push your throttle position to the maximum position (full open throttle). Press the Set button when ready. Set Maximum Please Connect to the OBD Dongle First!
Fuel Level Options Reset fuel level if you just filled your tank or manually edit the remaining fuel distance. Reset Edit Set Remaining Fuel Distance Set remaining distance Error: value cannot be higher than tank capacity or lower than 1 Error: not a valid distance number!
No DTC Errors DTC Errors Reset Errors Error Options Ignore Error: Error: You are not connected to the ECU!
OBD Monitor Service Running Connected to dongle! Disconnected from dongle!
OBD2 Demo Mode Demo mode is limited to 15 minutes per session. Buy the OBD Plugin to unlock! Buy Plugin
Instruments Settings Start Instruments Automatically Start all measurements (Play) on Roadbook view enter Total Distance - Single Decimal Place Will show the Total distance with a single decimal place instead of two Partial - Single Decimal Place Will show the Partial distance with a single decimal place instead of two Visual Settings Invert PDF Colors Inverts the paper color, might be useful for riding during the night. Lock Settings Lock also disables paper touch When lock is enabled any paper touch is ignored. This helps prevent accidental movements or rain drop actions. Lock also disables instruments When lock is enabled the instrument tap actions will also be disabled. Lock also disables top menu When lock is enabled the top menu will also be disabled and only the lock button will work. Sync lock with play/pause Locking will trigger play and unlocking will trigger pause. Adjustments Distance Multiplier Add a correction factor to Total and Partial distance (in case you need to match to Roadbook distances) Hide Instruments Panel If you have your own dedicated instruments and just want to use the PDF roll. Reset Session Unloads current PDF file and resets all statistics and distances. Confirm Reset Are you sure you want to reset the current progress? This unloads current PDF file and resets all statistics and distances! Reset Remote Controller Setup

Statistics File Name: No loaded file Total Time: Travel Time: Stop Time: Average Speed: Maximum Speed: Reset Open New File Discard current session and start new one or save progress first so that you can resume it later? Start Now Save First Error Opening File There seems to be a problem reading this PDF file. It is probably not compatible! Distance Correction Factor: Open File or Session Import new PDF file or open Session Manager (manage previous saved sessions)? File Session Give this session a name The session name cannot be empty! Nothing to save! Maybe start by opening a new Roadbook File. Replace or Add New Overwrite the current sessions or add a new entry? Overwrite New Entry Session Name Already Exists A session with this name already exists, do you want to replace or edit the name? Replace Edit Name
Session Manager No saved sessions yet! Save one first. Date: PDF File: Total Distance: Total Time: Travel Time: Average Speed: Load Rename Location Edit this session name This session name is already taken, please choose something else. ERROR: The PDF file for this session does not exist anymore! Session Load Confirmation Are you sure you want to load this session? Any unsaved Roadbook progress will be lost!
Roadbook Demo Mode Demo mode is limited to 15 minutes per session. Buy the Roadbook Plugin to unlock! Buy Plugin License Purchase Your device does not have Play Store installed, you can still purchase a key in our website and then insert it to activate it! Insert Key Purchase Please insert your license key to activate the plugin: Activate Error Activating License Wrong license code or already activated on another device, check licenses in your Thork Racing account page or contact support. License Activated Plugin is now active! Thank you for your support.
No Maps Downloaded Yet You have not yet downloaded any map files. Do you want to do it now? Starting Layers Manager! Select Navigation Mode Use DMD2 to calculate the route or use an external app? Use DMD2 External App Panning Mode Enabled Press and hold to unlock!
Map Layers Base Map Source Base data for terrain, roads, buildings, addresses, and elevation. 3D Buildings Converts building areas into basic extruded 3D shapes Scale & Visibility Adjust map, labels and symbols scale and visibility Map Scale Enable Layer Enable Labels Labels Scale Enable Symbols Symbols Scale Location Icon Adjust the current location icon Icon Scale Show Accuracy Range Enable Shadowssd Download Maps Select Maps to Load Error: The map files are missing, please download them again! No downloaded maps yet, click Download Maps to download! Select Region Select Map Downloaded: Last Update: Size: Region: File Name: Load Map: No Update DMD2 Downloading Please wait for the download to complete! Cannot connect to server, try again later! Not enough storage space! POI Icon Highlight Set POI icons to show at lower zoom levels (500m zoom max)(fuel/hospital/peaks are always enabled). Fuel Hospital Peaks Parking Restaurant Cafe Pub Cafe & Pub Hotel Hostel Accommodation Camping Supermarket Attraction View Point Historic Natural Parking Place Car Repair Monument ATM Bank Gas Station Motorcycle Repair Map Type & Style Select the default minimal and clean map type or a more detailed off-road topographic type. Also set the light and dark color modes. Default Minimal Off-Road Topo Light / Dark Mode: Light Dark Theme Sensor Topo Advanced Options Fine tune the Off-road Topographic map type High-Contrast Mode Show Altitude Lines Unpaved Highlight (visible at low zoom) Show Motorways Show Primary Roads Show Secondary Roads All settings have been reset to defaults! HillShading (online) Shows the topographical shape of hills and mountains using shading Opacity Routing UI Adjust the width of the calculated route line on the map Line Width Line Opacity Indications Size
GPX Manager Load File No file loaded. Press Load File. Reloading Files. Please wait. Tracks Waypoints Center Map GPX Settings Show or Hide Show or hide GPX elements (for all files). This takes priority over individual file settings. Show All Enabled GPX Tracks Show Track Direction Arrows Show All Enabled Waypoints Show Waypoint Title Text Hide Waypoints on Low Zoom Sizes & Opacity Set GPX elements default sizes & opacity Color Defaults Track line default color and color overwrites Track Line Width Track Opacity Direction Arrow Size Waypoint Pin Size Hide All Show All Delete All Default track color (when no color is specified or set by the user): Overwrite all colors set in files to default color: Overwrite all colors set by the user to default color: Auto Load POIs Automatically load POI along the track up to 3 categories Enable auto POI load along the track: Select POI categories to load: The selected GPX file does not contain any tracks! Track Manager No track description available. Track Length Navigate To… Navigate To Track Point Select to which track point you want to navigate. Track Start Closest Point Track End Convert to Route Please notice that this operation is really demanding and slow. The result might also not be a perfect match to the original track! Use with caution. Select Navigation App POI Search The selected GPX file does not contain any waypoints! Waypoints Manager Navigate To Share Location Search Near No waypoint description available. Straight Line Distance Distance from you Track Point Dist. Distance from track start You need to be riding on the same GPX file to get distances information. Waiting for GPS Fix Select app to share Loading GPX File Loading track POI search, this might take some time… Advanced Options Invert Travel Direction Attempt to convert full file to navigation: This GPX file does not contain any track!

Map Demo Mode Demo mode is limited to 15 minutes per session. Buy the Map Plugin to unlock! Buy Plugin Map Plugin Purchase Select subscription duration. 12 Month Subscription Lifetime Purchase 6 Month Subscription 12 Month 6 Month Lifetime This option is only available for licensed users!
Auto Zoom & Tilt Enable auto-zoom level Enable auto-tilt level Auto mode only in active navigation Interface Options Enable track progress info box Will show a box on the side of the screen with track progress and distances to next POIs and Waypoints. Disable map touch when locked Specially useful if you have a controller, disables the whole screen touch Auto lock when moving Map will automatically lock UI when you start moving Auto unlock when stopped Map will automatically unlock UI when you stop moving Map Language Map Language
Localised Map Language
English or available latin alphabet
French > English or available latin alphabet
German > English or available latin alphabet
Navigation Navigate To: Ask to use DMD2 or External If enabled DMD2 will ask if you want to use DMD2 or another app. If disabled it defaults to DMD2. Enable Voice Instructions Will use Text-To-Speech to provide voice instructions for the navigation. Show Waypoints on Map Will display routing instruction waypoint pin on the map.
